pages.text: Stradpole are tiny passive creatures that live naturally in lava, but they can also live in water too. You can transport them using a Bucket.$(br2)Despite popular belief, the Stradpole isn't useless. If you feed one a Crimson Mosquito Larva, it will grow up into an adult Straddler, allowing easy transport of Straddlers via Stradpoles in Buckets.
When $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/straddler)Straddler$(/l) hits you with a Stradpole, you take 1.5 damage, and the stradpole disappears after a few seconds.
